name: The North Face Homestead Bed -7C Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
This cocoon of campsite-coziness is sure to make your friends a little jealous. Lined with an ultra-soft fleece and loaded with insulation, the Homestead Bed makes your home-away-from-home even homier on chilly nights. If you need a big of extra warmth around the campfire, the top of the bag zips off into a quilt. With its roomy hood and blanket fold, cool air doesn’t stand a chance of keeping from your hard-earned zzzzs.Top panel zips off into a quilt for cozy campsite lounging.Lined with a soft fleece that's perfect for snuggling into.Generous hood keeps cold winds away and your camp pillow from rolling out.Roomy sleeping space is ready for all sleeping styles (expect for the starfish).Heatseeker™ Eco synthetic insulation is made of 30% post-consumer recycled material.
